    • createMessageTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.MessageTemplate createMessageTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.MessageTemplate messageTemplate) throws OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Create a MessageTemplate
      Parameters:
      messageTemplate - MessageTemplate to create.
      Returns:
      the created MessageTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • getMessageTemplate

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.MessageTemplate getMessageTemplate(cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.TemplateRequest templateRequest) throws OpenCDXNotFound, OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Get a TemplateRequest
      Parameters:
      templateRequest - Request ID of the MessageTemplate to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the requested MessageTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotFound - Template with requested ID not found.
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable

    • updateMessageTemplate

      Update MessageTemplate
      Parameters:
      messageTemplate - MessageTemplate to update.
      Returns:
      the updated MessageTemplate.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXFailedPrecondition - Missing event id.
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      SuccessResponse indicating if the action was successful.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON

    • listMessageTemplates

      cdx.opencdx.grpc.communication.MessageTemplateListResponse listMessageTemplates(cdx.opencdx.grpc.common.Pagination pagination) throws OpenCDXFailedPrecondition, OpenCDXNotFound, OpenCDXNotAcceptable
      Send Pagination
      Parameters:
      pagination - Pagination information to trigger.
      Returns:
      SuccessResponse indicating if the action was successful.
      Throws:
      OpenCDXNotFound - Template not found
      OpenCDXFailedPrecondition - Missing variable from data for substitution.
      OpenCDXNotAcceptable - Failed to convert to JSON
